EmailTemplate.description: STANLIB Corporate Case Awaiting Further Information Template
EmailTemplate.name: STANLIB Corporate Cash Awaiting Further Information
EmailTemplate.subject: We need more information: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We have made good progress but need additional information, {!Case.OwnerFullName} has reached out to you with the details.
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to call us on {!Case.OwnerPhone}, with your reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Regards, STANLIB Client Experience: Institutional
{!Case.Email_Thread}
